arabicText: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَظَلَمُوا۟ بِهَا ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	after	them,	We	sent	Moosa	with	our	signs	to	Firaun	and	his	court	members,	but	they	did	
injustice	to	those	signs;	therefore	see	what	sort	of	fate	befell	the	mischievous!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	un	ke	b’ad	hum	ne	Mūsā ko	apni	nishāniyoñ		ke	sāth	 fir'aun	aur	uske	darbariyoñ	ki	taraf	
bheja	to	unhoñ	ne	un	nishāniyoñ		par	ziyādati	ki	to	dekho	kaisa	anjām	huwa	mufsidoñ	(Fasād	
karne	wāloñ)	ka	.

arabicText: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَـٰفِرْعَوْنُ إِنِّى رَسُولٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	Moosa	said,	“O	Firaun!	Indeed	I	am	a	Noble	Messenger	from	the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Mūsā ne	kahā	aey	fir'aun!	maiñ	Parwar-Digār-e-Āalam	ka	Rasool	hooñ

arabicText: حَقِيقٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن لَّآ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ ۚ قَدْ جِئْتُكُم بِبَيِّنَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعِىَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
englishTranslationText:
“It	 is	 obligatory	 for	 me	 not	 to	 speak	
concerning	Allah except	 the	 truth;	 I	 have	
come	to	you	all	with	a	clear	sign	from	your	
Lord,	 therefore	 let	 the	 Descendants	 of	
Israel	go	with	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mujhe	 saza-wār	 (Munāsib	 yahi)	 hai	 ke	
Allah	par	na	kahuñ	magar	sachchi	bāt	maiñ	
tum	 sab	 ke	 pās	 tumhāre	 Rab	 ki	 taraf	 se	
nishāni	lekar	āaya	hooñ	to	tu	bani	Israeel
ko	mere	sāth	chhod	de
